Good afternoon,

Our messaging could have been better on this, but it's a legit removal, at least in my opinion. 

Yes, we strongly discourage the use of the word "retarded" in a pejorative sense, _regardless of who it refers to_, but this post is also not acceptable because of the larger context of how it references the champion's sexuality. Any commentary on how someone's lifestyle is tolerated, either by an individual or society at large, will almost always fall under the restrictions against political or social posts.

You can say things like, "I'm really upset that Neeko's sexuality seems to be such a front-and-center part of her character and I wish Riot would find other ways to create backstories." That's fine. We are not, however, going to entertain discussions about how someone's sexuality is "disgusting."

If you have any further questions or would like to discuss it further, please feel free to use the Moderation Discord.

{{champion:267}} We volunteer our time, but not our entire lives. Boards is not a situation where it is only operational during certain hours and therefore needs people to be present during those hours. Boards is open 24/7, through holidays and otherwise. To expect volunteer moderators to be present and actively moderating hundreds of posts in a day over multiple subboards all day every day is a bit much. We all haves lives, some of us  have jobs and families that require our time as well. As we are volunteers, we are not paid and as such we dont demand someone be here for 8+ hours a day in a shift. 

Knowing how many posts are reported in general in a day....responding to all of those as well as moderation duties just patrolling and posting on Boards is an incredible amount of work.

Could be do better? Absolutely. We are working on getting better and being better at what we do daily, but we do the best we can with what tools we have.

As per the discord. Discord was put into place for ease of interaction with moderators; so you can speak one on one with us and discuss whatever it is that you wish. You are by no means required to use it. You can post here on this subboard for any moderation inquiries you have as well and we will try to get to it in a timely manner :) The Djinn does an incredible amount of work here responding and talking to posters about inquiries, along with lots of the other mods.
